description:
When I first saw Curtis and learned he was willing to do more guy-on-guy work, I knew I had to put him with Nash.
Not only is Nash great with First-Timers, but the two have that whole bad-boy vibe going.
I even got Curtis to take the lead on the cocksucking. He was a little off-the-mark to start with, but he hit his groove and got Nash nice and hard.
Nash returns the favor and gets him hard enough to fuck him.
Curtis is in a bit of a haze when Nash asks him if he wants to fuck him. He doesn't even drop his pants, just goes to shove it in.
Nash power bottoms for him, and I am hoping Curtis will get the hint he can be a versatile player, especially when he literally fucks the cum out of him.
As for Curtis cumming, he takes a bit to ramp up, and ices practically all of Nash's butt. He does attempt a little breeding action, but he just gets wobbly too quickly.
I say for Curtis's first time, he did an awesome job, and I think he will continue to push his limits!
title: Curtis & Nash - RAW
